import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef, useCallback } from "react"; import styles from './header.module.css'; import '../../component/grid.css'; import '../../component/style.css'; import logo from '../img/logo.png'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import updateCartCount from '../updateCartCount'; const Header = () => { const [theLoaisMobile, setTheLoaisMobile] = useState([]); const [loadingMobile, setLoadingMobile] = useState(true); const cartCountRefPC = useRef(null); const cartCountRefMobile = useRef(null); const [tenKhach, setTenKhach] = useState('Khách'); // Giá trị mặc định const fetchTheLoaisMobile = useCallback(async () => { setLoadingMobile(true); try { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3001/theloais'); setTheLoaisMobile(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Lỗi khi tải danh mục thể loại (mobile):", error); } finally { setLoadingMobile(false); } }, []); useEffect(() => { fetchTheLoaisMobile(); updateCartCount(cartCountRefPC, cartCountRefMobile); // Kiểm tra localStorage khi component mount const storedTenKhachHang = localStorage.getItem('tenKhachHang'); if (storedTenKhachHang) { setTenKhach(storedTenKhachHang); } const handleCartUpdate = () => { updateCartCount(cartCountRefPC, cartCountRefMobile); }; window.addEventListener('cartUpdated', handleCartUpdate); return () => { window.removeEventListener('cartUpdated', handleCartUpdate); }; }, [fetchTheLoaisMobile, cartCountRefPC, cartCountRefMobile]); return (

); }; export default Header;
